name: qeep/telegram-dto
description: Common Telegram DTOs for all services

post-install-cmd: bash -c '[ -f .git-hooks/pre-commit ] && command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1 && if [ -d $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks) ]; then cp .git-hooks/pre-commit $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks)/ && chmod +x $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks)/pre-commit; fi'
post-update-cmd: bash -c '[ -f .git-hooks/pre-commit ] && command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1 && if [ -d $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks) ]; then cp .git-hooks/pre-commit $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks)/ && chmod +x $(git rev-parse --git-path hooks)/pre-commit; fi'
